Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 64th/Stony Island
ShortDescription: Westbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island, Marquette, Cornell and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 64th/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island, Marquette, Cornell and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 64th/Stony Island.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change at Kedzie; Station Bypass at Central Park
ShortDescription: Pink Line service running w/delays due to police investigation at Central Park; board all trains on the Loop-bound side at Kedzie and Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service is running with delays due to a police investigation at Central Park.  Trains are bypassing Central Park in both directions.

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track between Kedzie and Pulaski stations.

 Board/exit all trains on the Loop-bound side of the platform at Kedzie and Pulaski.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress Parkway, Pulaski, Jackson, Kostner and Harrison due to police activity.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
